alert.note: Alert for Forest; Langlade; Northern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 3:26AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Forest, northern Oconto and central Langlade Counties through 415 AM CDT... At 325 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Antigo, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Antigo around 330 AM CDT. Pearson around 350 AM CDT. Ma Ka Ja Wan Scout Reservation around 355 AM CDT. Woodlawn around 410 AM CDT. Carter around 415 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Bryant, Boot Lake Campground, Polar, Kempster, Neva, Lawrence Lake Natural Area, Choate, Peters Marsh Wildlife Area, Lily and Deerbrook. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
